skillTree.localised_description: The pride of Nehekharan armies, impacting enemy lines with bone-shattering force and grinding the corpses beneath their heavy wheels.
Long-dead destriers, awakened to serve their Unliving masters far beyond death.
Soaked in and toughened by embalming fluid, the cloth bindings used to mummify afford the wearer additional protection from all but a direct hit from mortal projectiles.
The fluid used to embalm the Tomb King toughens his bindings, enabling him to withstand a greater degree of damage than would otherwise be possible.
Who wants to live forever? As it turns out, most beings wouldn't say noâ€¦

effects.description: When normally killed in action, this Hero will be wounded instead

skillTree.localised_description: Having learned much in their long years of service, this character now turns their attention to training others.

effects.description: Character will share +15% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type
Character will share +30% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type
Character will share +50% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type

skillTree.localised_description: The firstborn son of a Tomb King is given to the gods, where he may serve the future itself as part of the Mortuary Cult.

effects.description:
Enemy Winds of Magic power reserve change: -15% when increasing
	(local region)

skillTree.localised_description: The second son of a second son shall succeed his father when the time comes. It is the custom.
The younger sons of a Tomb King command detachments within his armies, ensuring their father's unshakeable, iron will is enacted to the letter.
In Nehekhara, those sworn to serve its rulers do not stay 'properly' dead for long.
Fighting inside or outside nehekhara is the same has long as we have maps of the land.
Nyletoth is a master of the chariot and won many battles fighting from his prized golden vehicle pulled by a team of the finest Khemrian stallions.
As undead don't retire they can keep fighting at maximum strength during the whole battle.

effects.description:
Weapon strength: +10% for Skeleton Chariots and Skeleton Archer Chariot units
	(Hero's army)

Missile strength: +10% for Skeleton Archer Chariot units
	(Hero's army)

skillTree.localised_description: Chariots may seem unwieldy in large formations but Nyletoth's tactics allow his army to flank even entretched armies.

skillTree.localised_description: In death, Nyletoth remains a master charioteer and often leads a large formation of chariots in battle.

skillTree.localised_description: It is not possible to defeat such unshakeable spirit once its owner's mind is made up.
Kill many and you *are* a conqueror; godhood is then but a protracted slaughter away...
This warrior is one with their blade; it is an extension of their will, making them a worthy foe in combat.
Hand-to-hand combat is a lethal match of cut and thrust. However, itâ€™s not all about offensive strikes; parries and other defensive moves can also win the day.
The iron will and indomitable presence of this leader ensures their followers remain steadfast when facing peril.
He whose will transcends death can strike out from beyond the grave, to devastating effect.
Such is their power and ferocity, a wound-maker will ravage the foe, cutting and pulverising until there is only one exit: death.
Full-plate armour protects the wearer from head-to-foot. Many such suits are blessed or imbued with arcane abilities.
Some creatures charge home with such fury that the very ground shakes beneath their feet.
Death is not an impedance to the strongest of wills.
Beware the scorpion's sting, hidden 'neath the desert sands yet always poised to strike.
This champion extols discipline and fear away from the battlefield as much as on it.

effects.description: Training action: Experience per turn is increased by an additional 20
Training action: Experience per turn is increased by an additional 35
Training action: Experience per turn is increased by an additional 50

skillTree.localised_description: The sight of this warrior, their stature, import or infamy, can have a calming effect.

effects.description: Spread Control action: Control is modified by an additional 1
Spread Control action: Control is modified by an additional 2
Spread Control action: Control is modified by an additional 3

skillTree.localised_description: "If they know I'm coming then more's the better!"

effects.description: Assault Garrison action: Additional 5% casualties inflicted
Assault Garrison action: Additional 15% casualties inflicted
Assault Garrison action: Additional 30% casualties inflicted

skillTree.localised_description: A skilled assassin is a cold-hearted killer and merciless murderer.
Lying in wait, experienced and patient, striking when the foe least expects.

effects.description: Assault Units action: Additional 3% casualties inflicted
Assault Units action: Additional 8% casualties inflicted
Assault Units action: Additional 15% casualties inflicted

skillTree.localised_description: An expert in their craft, this Hero knows all the mistakes that can be made and how to best avoid making them.
These jars contain the remains of many Liche Priests, which are useful for raising and binding a new force.

backgroundSkills.localised_description: In life, Nyletoth loved nothing better than horses and charioteering. In death, he remains a master charioteer and often leads a large formation of chariots in battle.

effects.description:
Construction cost: -25% for Chariot buildings

	(Hero's army)
Melee attack: +8 on Skeleton Chariot mount
Melee defence: +8 on Skeleton Chariot mount

backgroundSkills.localised_description: These gleaming, golden weapons represent the high status of the bearer, and all in his presence are humbled by the aura of majesty these weapons convey.

effects.description: Grants Weapon: "Crook and Flail of Radiance"
